attributes.action: Stop sending weapons and money to the Ukraine stop promoting war.
attributes.additional_details: We the people do not want to fight any more wars.
attributes.background:
Stop attacking Russia through the Ukraine 
Stop send British money and weapons to the Ukraine 
Stop training troops to fight in the Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615481
